page.title: 05Leisure
page.content: We asked 70 people living in Barlestone how they spent their spare time.Half of the 70 people belonged to a club or group in Barlestone.Most people went out of the village during the weekend,this was especially true for the young people.For their holidays 33% went abroad,33% went somewhere in Britain,34% stayed at home. In Mkt. Bosworth there is a squash club,a bowls club and a shooting club. The Community Centre in the school offers a wide range of sporting activities such as Badminton,Tennis,Archery and volleyball.There are local Football and Rugby teams.
